thread.title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
thread.title_full: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'

title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
text: > Entertainment NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas' In this Jan. 23, 2014 file photo, FBI agents flank Vincent Asaro as they escort the reputed mobster from FBI offices in New York. More than 30 years after one of the largest cash robberies in U.S. history, the now 80-year-old Asaro will stand trial in New York for helping to plan the heist that became immortalized in the Martin Scorsese mob movie "Goodfellas." (Charles Eckert/Newsday, via AP, File) NYC OUT
